52935.summary: Some customers in the Park Royal area of West Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52935.title: Aug 30 - West Vancouver (Park Royal) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
